title: Contracts for Difference (CFD) Scheme

details.body:
Stakeholder Events

We will publish material in relation to CFD stakeholder events on this page.

Event on 1 December

National Grid as EMR Delivery Body, Low Carbon Contracts Company (LCCC) and the Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy (BEIS) co-hosted an ‘Introduction to CFD Allocation Round’ event on 1 December 2016 following the announcement on the 9 November which set out details in relation to the second CFD allocation round.

This event provided an introduction to the CFD process, best estimates of the round timeline and an opportunity to meet with representatives from the key delivery partners (National Grid - EMR Delivery Body and LCCC/ESC) as well as key energy policy representatives from BEIS.

Slides from 1 December event

MS Powerpoint Presentation, 299KB

This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format.

If you use assistive technology (eg a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email BEISContractsForDifference@beis.gov.uk . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use.

Stakeholder bulletin list

From time to time we may want to send stakeholders updates in relation to this policy. If you would like to be added to this list, please email BEISContractsForDifference@beis.gov.uk

description: Information relating to the Contracts for Difference (CFD) allocation rounds held this Parliament will be published on these pages.
